languages.text: "Да эти заблудшие позабыли истинный лик Бога-Императора! Все, что несчастным досталось в память о Его благословении и могуществе — лишь священная аквила". {n}Арджента сокрушенно качает головой.{/n} "Каллигосу Винтерскейлу стоило бы заботиться о просвещении своих миров вместо удовлетворения охотничьего азарта".

traits.locale_text: "Да эти заблудшие позабыли истинный лик Бога-Императора! Все, что несчастным досталось в память о Его благословении и могуществе — лишь священная аквила". {n}Арджента сокрушенно качает головой.{/n} "Каллигосу Винтерскейлу стоило бы заботиться о просвещении своих миров вместо удовлетворения охотничьего азарта".
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "These lost souls have forgotten the true image of the God-Emperor! The only reminder they have is the sacred Aquila." {n}Argenta shakes her head sadly.{/n} "Calligos Winterscale should concern himself with educating his worlds instead of indulging his craving for the hunt."
languages.original_text: "Да эти заблудшие позабыли истинный лик Бога-Императора! Все, что несчастным досталось в память о Его благословении и могуществе — лишь священная аквила". {n}Арджента сокрушенно качает головой.{/n} "Каллигосу Винтерскейлу стоило бы заботиться о просвещении своих миров вместо удовлетворения охотничьего азарта".

traits.locale_text: "The lost have forgotten the true face of the God-Emperor! The only memento they have is the sacred Aquila." {n}Argenta sadly shakes her head.{/n} "Calligos Winterscale should worry himself with educating his world, and not with satiating his own hunting excitement."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The lost have forgotten the true face of the God-Emperor! The only memento they have is the sacred Aquila." {n}Argenta sadly shakes her head.{/n} "Calligos Winterscale should worry himself with educating his world, and not with satiating his own hunting excitement."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "The lost have forgotten the true face of the God-Emperor! The only memento they have is the sacred Aquila." {n}Argenta sadly shakes her head.{/n} "Calligos Winterscale should worry himself with educating his world, and not with satiating his hunting excitement."

traits.locale_text: "The lost have forgotten the true face of the God-Emperor! The only memento they have is the sacred Aquila." {n}Argenta sadly shakes her head.{/n} "Calligos Winterscale should worry himself with educating his world, and not with satiating his hunting excitement."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "These lost souls have forgotten the true image of the God-Emperor! The only reminder they have is the sacred Aquila." {n}Argenta shakes her head sadly.{/n} "Calligos Winterscale should concern himself with educating his worlds instead of indulging his craving for the hunt."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

traits.locale_text: "These lost souls have forgotten the true image of the God-Emperor! The only reminder they have is the sacred Aquila." {n}Argenta shakes her head sadly.{/n} "Calligos Winterscale should concern himself with educating his worlds instead of indulging his craving for the hunt."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: «¡Estos desventurados han olvidado el verdadero rostro del Dios Emperador! El único recuerdo que les queda es la sagrada Aquila». {n}Argenta menea la cabeza tristemente.{/n} «Calligos Winterscale debería preocuparse más la educación en sus mundos y centrarse menos en su pasión por la caza».
languages.original_text: "These lost souls have forgotten the true image of the God-Emperor! The only reminder they have is the sacred Aquila." {n}Argenta shakes her head sadly.{/n} "Calligos Winterscale should concern himself with educating his worlds instead of indulging his craving for the hunt."

traits.locale_text: «¡Estos desventurados han olvidado el verdadero rostro del Dios Emperador! El único recuerdo que les queda es la sagrada Aquila». {n}Argenta menea la cabeza tristemente.{/n} «Calligos Winterscale debería preocuparse más por instruir a los habitantes de este mundo en vez de saciar su pasión por la caza».
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: “这些失落的灵魂早已遗忘了神皇真实的模样！他们唯一能纪念帝皇的标志，就是神圣的双头鹰。”{n}阿洁塔悲伤地摇了摇头。{/n}“卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔应该把精力放在教化他的世界上，而不是一昧满足他狩猎的渴望。”
languages.original_text: "These lost souls have forgotten the true image of the God-Emperor! The only reminder they have is the sacred Aquila." {n}Argenta shakes her head sadly.{/n} "Calligos Winterscale should concern himself with educating his worlds instead of indulging his craving for the hunt."

traits.locale_text: “失落的人们已经遗忘了神皇真实的模样！他们唯一能纪念帝皇的事物，就是神圣的双头鹰。”{n}阿洁塔悲伤地摇了摇头。{/n}“卡里戈斯·温特斯凯尔应该把精力放在教化他的世界上，而不是一昧满足他的狩猎欲望。”
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: « Ces âmes perdues ont oublié le véritable visage de l'Empereur-Dieu ! L'Aquila sacré est le seul souvenir qu'il leur reste de lui, {n}remarque Argenta en secouant tristement la tête.{/n} Calligos Winterscale devrait se soucier d'éduquer son monde, au lieu de chercher à satisfaire sa passion pour la chasse. »
languages.original_text: "These lost souls have forgotten the true image of the God-Emperor! The only reminder they have is the sacred Aquila." {n}Argenta shakes her head sadly.{/n} "Calligos Winterscale should concern himself with educating his worlds instead of indulging his craving for the hunt."

traits.locale_text: « Ces âmes perdues ont oublié le véritable visage de l'Empereur-Dieu ! L'Aquila sacré est le seul souvenir qu'il leur reste de lui, {n}remarque Argenta en secouant tristement la tête.{/n} Calligos Winterscale devrait se soucier d'éduquer son monde, au lieu de chercher à satisfaire sa passion pour la chasse. »
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: 「迷いし者たちは神帝陛下の真の顔を忘れてしまったのだ！彼らが持っている唯一の形見は、神聖なアクィラだけだ」{n}アルジェンタは悲しげに首を振った。{/n}「カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは、狩りの興奮を満たすことではなく、自分の世界を教育することを心配すべきだ」
languages.original_text: "These lost souls have forgotten the true image of the God-Emperor! The only reminder they have is the sacred Aquila." {n}Argenta shakes her head sadly.{/n} "Calligos Winterscale should concern himself with educating his worlds instead of indulging his craving for the hunt."

traits.locale_text: 「迷いし者たちは神帝陛下の真の顔を忘れてしまったのだ！彼らが持っている唯一の形見は、神聖なアクィラだけだ」{n}アルジェンタは悲しげに首を振った。{/n}「カリゴス・ウィンタースケールは、狩りの興奮を満たすことではなく、自分の世界を教育することを心配すべきだ」
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Diese verlorenen Seelen haben das wahre Aussehen des Gottimperators vergessen! Die einzige Erinnerung, die wir haben, ist der heilige Aquila." {n}Argenta schüttelt traurig den Kopf.{/n} "Calligos Winterzunder sollte sich lieber damit befassen, Bildung auf seine Welten zu bringen, als seine Jagdgier zu stillen."
languages.original_text: "These lost souls have forgotten the true image of the God-Emperor! The only reminder they have is the sacred Aquila." {n}Argenta shakes her head sadly.{/n} "Calligos Winterscale should concern himself with educating his worlds instead of indulging his craving for the hunt."

traits.locale_text: "Die Verlorenen haben das wahre Gesicht des Gottimperators vergessen! Die einzige Erinnerung, die wir haben, ist der heilige Aquila." {n}Argenta schüttelt traurig den Kopf.{/n} "Calligos Winterzunder sollte lieber seiner Welt eine bessere Bildung zukommen lassen, als seinen Jagdtrieb stillen."
traits.speaker: ArgentaCompanion

languages.text: "Tanrı İmparator'un hakiki sureti, bu kayıp ruhların hafızalarından silinmiş. Tek hatırladıkları, kutsal Çift Başlı Kartal." {n}Argenta, hüzünle başını sallıyor.{/n} "Calligos Winterscale, ava duyduğu açlığı tatmin etmekten ziyade dünyalarını eğitmekle meşgul olmalı."
languages.original_text: "These lost souls have forgotten the true image of the God-Emperor! The only reminder they have is the sacred Aquila." {n}Argenta shakes her head sadly.{/n} "Calligos Winterscale should concern himself with educating his worlds instead of indulging his craving for the hunt."
